game.name: School Crisis
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A third-person co-op stealth comedy where up to four players sneak into an all-girls campus, while one player becomes the principal — the aggressive hunter with a shinai. Talk to the girls who only trust specific characters, complete missions, rescue captured friends, and survive the chaos together.
